verses.roman:
ekādaśe--haridāsa-ṭhākurera niryāṇa
bhakta-vātsalya yāhāṅ dekhāilā gaura bhagavān

synonyms: ekādaśe—in the Eleventh Chapter; haridāsa-ṭhākurera niryāṇa—the disappearance of Śrīla Haridāsa Ṭhākura; bhakta-vātsalya—affection for the devotee; yāhāṅ—wherein; dekhāilā—exhibited; gaura bhagavān—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: The Eleventh Chapter describes the disappearance of Haridāsa Ṭhākura and how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, showed His affection for His devotees.
